Package DAO

Class AppointmentDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDaoImpl
public class AppointmentDaoImpl extends Object
This class creates the Appointment database methods.
Author:
Mehdi Rahimi

  • Method Details

    • getAppointmentByUserId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentByUserId(int userID) throws SQLException
      This function takes in a user ID and returns a list of appointments associated with that user ID
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose appointments you want to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for a specific user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getAppointmentsByCustomerId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByCustomerId(int customerId) throws SQLException
      This method takes a customer ID as a parameter and returns an ObservableList of Appointments that are associated with that customer ID
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer ID of the customer you want to get the appointments for.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for a specific customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments() throws SQLException
      This function returns an ObservableList of all Appointments in the database. It is used to populate the Appointments table view in the Appointments tab.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, Timestamp createDate, String createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdateBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      Adds a new appointment to the database with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      appointmentTitle - the title for the new appointment
      appointmentDescription - the description for the new appointment
      appointmentLocation - the location for the new appointment
      appointmentType - the type for the new appointment
      appointmentStart - the start time for the new appointment
      appointmentEnd - the end time for the new appointment
      createDate - the timestamp of when the appointment was created
      createdBy - the username of the user who created the appointment
      lastUpdate - the timestamp of when the appointment was last updated
      lastUpdateBy - the username of the user who last updated the appointment
      customerID - the ID of the customer associated with the appointment
      userID - the ID of the user who created the appointment
      contactID - the ID of the contact associated with the appointment
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement

    • modifyAppointment

      public static void modifyAppointment(int appointmentID, String appointmentTitle, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, LocalDateTime appointmentStart, LocalDateTime appointmentEnd, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdateBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing appointment in the database with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to be updated
      appointmentTitle - the updated title for the appointment
      appointmentDescription - the updated description for the appointment
      appointmentLocation - the updated location for the appointment
      appointmentType - the updated type for the appointment
      appointmentStart - the updated start time for the appointment
      appointmentEnd - the updated end time for the appointment
      lastUpdate - the timestamp of when the appointment was last updated
      lastUpdateBy - the username of the user who last updated the appointment
      customerID - the ID of the customer associated with the appointment
      userID - the ID of the user who created the appointment
      contactID - the ID of the contact associated with the appointment
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement

    • deleteAppointmentByApptId

      public static void deleteAppointmentByApptId(int appointmentID)
      This method deletes an appointment from the database based on the appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The appointment ID of the appointment you want to delete.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      This is the method to delete an appointment. The method executes an SQL query to delete an existing Appointment in the Appointments table of the database with the selected Appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to delete.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.

    • deleteApptCustID

      public static void deleteApptCustID(int customerID, int appointmentID)
      This is the method to delete an appointment when a customer is deleted. The method executes an SQL query to delete an existing Appointment in the Appointments table of the database with the selected Customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer being deleted
      appointmentID - the ID of the appointment to delete

    • typeAppt

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<AppointmentType> typeAppt() throws SQLException
      This is the method to create the ObservableList typeAppt with only the distinct appointment types. The method executes an SQL query to select only the distinct Type strings from the Appointments table.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList typeAppt with only the distinct appointment types
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.

    • countMonthType

      public static int countMonthType(AppointmentType selectedType, String month) throws SQLException
      This method takes in a selected appointment type and a month and returns the number of appointments of that type in that month
      Parameters:
      selectedType - The type of appointment that is selected from the combo box.
      month - The month to be counted.
      Returns:
      The number of appointments of a certain type in a certain month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.

    • getAppointmentsByContactId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByContactId(int selectedContactID) throws SQLException
      This method takes in a contact ID and returns a list of appointments associated with that contact ID
      Parameters:
      selectedContactID - The ID of the contact that was selected in the table view.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments that are associated with the selected contact.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.

    • getCurrentMonthAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCurrentMonthAppointments() throws SQLException
      This method returns an ObservableList of Appointment objects that are scheduled for the current month.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments that are scheduled for the current month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.

    • getCurrentWeekAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getCurrentWeekAppointments() throws NullPointerException, SQLException
      This function returns an ObservableList of Appointment objects that are scheduled for the current week
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments that are scheduled for the current week.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.
      NullPointerException - if the result set is empty.

    • countCustAppt

      public static int countCustAppt(int customerID)
      This function counts the number of appointments a customer has.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The customer ID of the customer to count the appointments for.
      Returns:
      The number of appointments for a given customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL statement.
